events.name: PostCreated
events.description: This event signifies the creation of a new post for products.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: This event denotes an update made to an existing post.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: This event indicates that a post has been deleted.

events.name: PostPromoted
events.description: This event mentions that a post has been promoted for better visibility.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: This event signifies the creation of a new post for products.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: This event denotes an update made to an existing post.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: This event indicates that a post has been deleted.

commands.name: PromotePost
commands.description: This event mentions that a post has been promoted for better visibility.

integrationPoints.name: ProductService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the Product Service to fetch product details for posts.

integrationPoints.name: UserService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the User Service for user details related to posts.

integrationPoints.name: AnalyticsService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with the Analytics Service to track post engagement.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration for notifications related to post activities.
